detectors.description:
Token._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#186-202) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(_balances[_to] + _value > _balances[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#192)
	- previousBalances = _balances[_from] + _balances[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#194)
	- _balances[_from] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#196)
	- _balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#198)
	- assert(bool)(_balances[_from] + _balances[_to] == previousBalances) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#201)
detectors.markdown:
[Token._transfer(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#L186-L202) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [require(bool)(_balances[_to] + _value > _balances[_to])](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#L192)
	- [previousBalances = _balances[_from] + _balances[_to]](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#L194)
	- [_balances[_from] -= _value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#L196)
	- [_balances[_to] += _value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#L198)
